body_html:
@alicetragedy Do we really show "How did you get into programming?" (it was not on the list here, that's why I'm clarifying).
Do we not show "For how many months have you been learning the language of your primary project?"?
body_text:
@alicetragedy Do we really show "How did you get into programming?" (it was not on the list here, that's why I'm clarifying).
Do we not show "For how many months have you been learning the language of your primary project?"?
body:
@alicetragedy Do we really show "How did you get into programming?" (it was not on the list [here](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/organization/wiki/Processes:-Application-Process-2017-(design)#other-changes), that's why I'm clarifying).
Do we not show "For how many months have you been learning the language of your primary project?"?
